comments.body:
Can you add the license file by following:

http://conda-forge.github.io/docs/meta.html#packaging-the-license-manually

It looks like the text of the license is in the README.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@  home: https://bitbucket.org/cfpython/cfunits-python
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: '{{ environ["RECIPE_DIR"] }}/LICENSE.txt'
  summary: 'A python interface to UNIDATA`s Udunits-2 package with CF extensions'
